Installation¶

This repository is not packaged yet. The module is imported directly from the src directory.

Requirements¶

Python 3.10+

Required packages:

  • pandas

  • requests

Optional (documentation):

  • sphinx

Installation example:

pip install pandas requests sphinx

Repository Structure¶

Expected folders:

  • src/ : Python module

  • data/ : SQLite archive

  • scripts/ : execution entrypoints

  • notebooks/ : exploratory notebooks
